page.title: 04Choirs in Rhos (Continued)
page.content: The choir has been going for twenty_eight years.There are no age limits.They have just been to America and are planning to go again in two years time.Their uniform is a brown suit and a white shirt. The conductor of the Male Voice Choir is Colin Jones and their accompanist is John Tudor Davies.Their uniform is a black suit and a white shirt.They have just been to America and they are going back in October.The conductor has been with the choir for twenty eight years.He was their accompanist for five years.Their accompanist now been with them for twenty-eight years.The choir has been going for ninety-four years
